The Willows Project Launch
{!Contact.FirstName}
Did you enjoy doing a project day with a charity or the Big Challenge . . . .then this is for you!
The Willows Project’s aim is to connect socially isolated groups, using nature to bring people together. To launch the project we need your help to help paint the project shed, make growing beds and plant crops. There will be lots of different organisations there to help and celebrate the project including Chapter One, Way Ahead Project, Mencap, ESHwork, Springfield Mind and Warwickshire Young Carers’ Come along for a fun day of activities, get to meet and learn about organisations working in your community, and eat an organically grown meal with cake to follow.
We'd love to know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on one of the following:
Where:
Canalside Community Farm Radford Semele
Meet at Leamington train station, where there will be transport to the farm.
When: Saturday 18th May
9.30 am - 4.30 pm
On the day you will need to wear clothes you don't mind getting dirty and practical footwear. Bring: waterproofs, sun screen, water and any medication needed.
